amendment.description: To include an evaluation of the impact of a final rule promulgated by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency in a study conducted by the National Academy of Sciences.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2199 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2199 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Jeffords to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14993-14994; text: CR S14993-14994) To include an evaluation of the impact of a final rule promulgated by the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency in a study conducted by the National Academy of Sciences.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2199 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Jeffords to Amendment SA 2150.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2199 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
